name: ES Cookie Notice
author: Electric Studio

sections.description: The notice will display once and will set a cookie for 730 days (2 years). The plugin can be configured in the WordPress Admin Panel via Settings >> ES Cookie Notice Options.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload es-cookie-notice.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin in the WordPress Admin Panel via Settings >> ES Cookie Notice Options.
sections.faq:
The message isn’t styled up… Why?

Once you have activated the plugin you need to configure it. You can do this in the WordPress admin panel via Settings >> ES Cookie Notice Options.

The message only appears once… Why?

Correct, the plugin sets a cookie basically saying that the notice has been seen so don’t show it again. To see the message again simply clear your browsers cookie cache.

short_description: The Electric Studio Cookie notice plugin adds a cookie notice to the top of the website which is displayed via AJAX.
description: The notice will display once and will set a cookie for 730 days (2 years). The plugin can be configured in the WordPress Admin Panel via Settings >> ES Cookie Notice Options.
